name: CHAT.ixi
description: CHAT.ixi is an IXI (IOTA eXtension Interface) module for the Iota Controlled agenT (Ict). It extends the functionality of the core Ict client with a chat application which allows users in the Ict network to exchange messages on a permissionless, distributed data-integrity protocol - the Tangle.

name: Economic Clustering
description: Economic Clustering (EC) is the consensus mechanism in the Ict network. This allows you to come to consensus with others on the confirmation state of transactions.

name: Bridge.ixi
description: Bridge.ixi represents the interface which allows modules written in any programming language to interact with the underlying infrastructure. By giving everyone the opportunity to participate with their desired programming language, Bridge.ixi will help grow the module ecosystem.
